The claim of an advertisement for a prod: s Winking Glue was found to be false.
The image of the Johnson: s Winking Glue print ad has been circulating online since at least April 2016.
The person who shared the image: Cris Shapan, is a comedian and graphic designer known for creating fake ads.
The man pictured winking in the image wa: era advertisement for a hair care product called Johnson's Ultra Wave, not Johnson's Winking Glue.
